Description:
Quality Control: Monitor and maintain the quality of coffee and other products served by our vending machines. Ensure that all machines are calibrated correctly, ingredients are fresh, and drinks meet our high standards.
Inventory Management: Manage and track inventory levels for coffee beans, milk, cups, and other supplies. Implement a system to reorder supplies as needed to prevent stockouts.
Machine Maintenance: Oversee the regular maintenance and servicing of coffee vending machines. Coordinate with technicians to address any issues promptly and minimize downtime.
Route Optimization: Plan and optimize the routes for machine restocking and maintenance visits to ensure efficient operations and timely service.
Cost Management: Monitor operational costs, including supplies, maintenance, and labor. Identify areas for cost reduction and efficiency improvement.
Customer Satisfaction: Gather customer feedback and respond to complaints or concerns. Strive to exceed customer expectations by maintaining clean and well-stocked machines.
Training and Development: Train and supervise a team of technicians and field operators to ensure they follow best practices and deliver exceptional service.
Data Analysis: Utilize data analytics tools to track machine performance, usage patterns, and product preferences. Use data-driven insights to make informed decisions.Skills
Skills:
Coffee Expertise: A strong passion for and knowledge of coffee, including brewing methods, bean selection, and flavor profiles.
Operations Management: Proven experience in operations management, preferably in the vending machine or food service industry.
Inventory Control: Proficiency in inventory management and supply chain logistics.
Technical Aptitude: Basic understanding of coffee vending machine mechanics and the ability to troubleshoot common issues.
Data Analysis: Strong analytical skills to interpret data and use it for operational improvements.
Team Leadership: Leadership and team management skills to motivate and guide a team of technicians and field operators.
Customer Focus: A commitment to delivering exceptional customer service and the ability to address customer concerns.

Data.Company Industry: Retail & Wholesale; Food & Beverage Production; Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant
